overview:
I am Abhijith Founder & CEO â€“ Agnes Outsourcing Services, my chronicle of relevant thoughts, challenges and other random musings in the meandering journey towards realizing our goals at Agnes. I am responsible for the strategy, vision, technology, marketing and sales of several business units at Agnes.

The goal behind starting Agnes was to build a business that leverages on opportunities that a connected globe has to offer. At Agnes, we Market and Sales services, that is used by number of users worldwide.

We have a great team of people churning out some of the coolest technology in the world; our people are passionate about their daily jobs, because they can see that their contribution makes a difference. All our Business Units have been profitable from inception and continue to grow rapidly. Despite our exponential growth in terms of clientele, people, and revenue, (staff strength = 20+ and growing)
